title: Patch  7.1 unspecified error
body:
I got this error when i loaded up league, i uinstalled league completely via this thread here and follow all of its instructions http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/VZP5kXhI-having-issues-patching-71-click-here

When i try to install league of legends it gives me the same error {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
I think I have the same problem, but I have tried it on both the Legacy and the updated Client.
on the Legacy Client it starts at 33% and after it scans the files the error pops up ( error code 004 )
But on the updated Client it's at 0% the whole time it is scanning but when it is done the same code pops up and says Patching failed and we are not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again ( error code 004 )

I am going to try a repair 1st to see if that sorts anything out before i uninstall and redownload the client
I got it working, it was because my programs stopped it from updating.

If this is happening at 33% in the legacy version, then something in your network is blocking you from connecting to the patching servers.  If it fails to connect then it won't be able to download updates and will result in an error.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
At what % are you receiving the unspecified error?  Is this on the legacy or updated client?  I might be able to help with just a bit more info!
I'd really like to help but I need some more specific information, like what % exactly.  Even if it's various, they are happening for specific reasons.  Let me know!
